title: Господь и стражник
author: Pominov Andrey
description:
This artpiece is done with oil on canvas. 'The Lord and Guard' is related to hystorism being a representative of religion genre. Here emotions are talking with you through static story. The latter is based on the long biblical story that describes in details the last days of Jesus, the trial process and accompanying ridicule.

This artwork took part in several art festivals and exhibitions approved by corresponding certificates and galleries art catalogues.

Pay attention: Upon buying the digitalized copy of this masterpiece in Ultra HD 1:1 resolution, you will receive the original physical Authentic Painting.
